equipmentSlots.label: virtushelm
equipmentSlots.name: Virtus mask
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Build up for etect/amascut/masterwork
can use zuriels if cheaper

equipmentSlots.label: kalket
equipmentSlots.name: Igneous Kal-Ket
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: your zuk cape buffs omnipower into one of your best moves it becomes essential

equipmentSlots.label: eof
equipmentSlots.name: Essence of Finality amulet
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Gstaff/zstaff/ibans/abs
gstaff is cheaper adren and lowers bosses defense sometimes making them 100% accurate
zstaff lowers mage damage for a boss strictly better than gstaff if a mage boss and 100% accurate
Ibans is a bigger adren dump bigger hit
abs can sometimes be used under fsoa spec and channellers ring due to passive

equipmentSlots.label: roarofawakening
equipmentSlots.name: Roar of Awakening
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
You need gconc and corruption blast
magma tempest and greater chain are optional but upgrades you get as you progress
precise 6 aftershock 1

equipmentSlots.label: virtustop
equipmentSlots.name: Virtus robe top
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Build up for etect/amascut/masterwork
can use zuriels if cheaper
Relentless 5 crackling 4
Biting 4 mobile 
if you just use biting 4 can put mobile on invig

equipmentSlots.label: odetodeceit
equipmentSlots.name: Ode to Deceit
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
aftershock4 eruptive 2
if you dont have e2 its fine
eventually can be used as a caroming 4 switch for gchain when you buildup for fsoa

equipmentSlots.label: virtuslegs
equipmentSlots.name: Virtus robe legs
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Build up for etect/amascut/masterwork
Devoted 4 impatient 4
invig 4 mobile/and a slayer like undead or demon
enhanced devoted 4 can work if you have fsoa as your main hand

equipmentSlots.label: wristwraps
equipmentSlots.name: Kerapac's wrist wraps
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
cinders if poison
can upgrade to masterwork or amascut

equipmentSlots.label: reaverring
equipmentSlots.name: Reaver's ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Channellers ring if boss isnt 100% accurate/using fsoa
if you have a ring of death use it and save up for reaver/channellers
Asylum surgeons ring is also useable

equipmentSlots.label: mani
equipmentSlots.name: Maniacal aura
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Mahj works if 100% accurate
when other auras are on cooldown can use dark magic/supreme invigorate/inspiration/supreme runic accuracy if not 100% accurate
vamp is considered leeching depending on the group
equilibrium is unuseable

equipmentSlots.label: grim
equipmentSlots.name: Erethdor's grimoire
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Wen/amascut/ful/jas all work
crits are always your bis when you have fsoa due to its passive

inventorySlots.label: salve
inventorySlots.name: Elder overload salve (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: use best Overload available

inventorySlots.label: poison4
inventorySlots.name: Weapon poison+++ (4)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: If a poison boss

inventorySlots.label: graspingpouch
inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
Runes for incite Fear
you can camp incite fear
incite fear is essential to being able to cast tsunami

inventorySlots.label: graspingpouchred
inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch (red)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
runes for smoke cloud
smoke cloud is not optional

inventorySlots.label: graspingpouchpink
inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch (pink)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
runes for animate dead/temporal anomaly if being used
overlapping runes for venge/dis shield

inventorySlots.label: arcane
inventorySlots.name: Arcane spirit shield
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: you may for a turtling 4 switch for higher end content

inventorySlots.label: salvee
inventorySlots.name: Salve amulet (e)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: bis for undead bosses

inventorySlots.label: restore
inventorySlots.name: Super restore flask (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
eventually can replace with blessed flask, flask is optional but an ease of accessibility and more affordable than penance powder
may need more or less

inventorySlots.label: fsoa
inventorySlots.name: Fractured Staff of Armadyl
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
Build for this
Precise 6 rutheless1 aftershock 4 eruptive 2
if you don't have e2 its fine

inventorySlots.label: kalgscrolls
inventorySlots.name: Kal'gerion Demon scroll (Crit-i-Kal)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
Kalg needs scrolls and should be your first option
Ripper is good for team bossing where kalg doesnt stack scrolls optional
Hellhound for learning

conservation of energy is not optional
eventually save for praesaul and affliction

primaryRelics.name: Conservation of Energy
primaryRelics.description: After using an ultimate ability, you will regain 10% adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: conservationofenergy

primaryRelics.name: Fury of the Small
primaryRelics.description: All adrenaline generating basic abilities generate +1% adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: furyofthesmall
deathward
primaryRelics.name: Death Ward
primaryRelics.description: 5% damage reduction when your life points are below 50%; 10% damage reduction when they are below 25%.

alternativeRelics.label: persistentrage
alternativeRelics.name: Persistent Rage
alternativeRelics.description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.

alternativeRelics.label: berserkersfury
alternativeRelics.name: Berserkers Fury
alternativeRelics.description: Deal up to +5.5% damage (all styles) the lower your current life points are below max. (Doesn't stack with Dharok's set effect.)
